scripts.dev: npm run copy-assets && npm run shred-docs && npm run copy-docs && npm run llms && npm run llms-full && npm run llms-full:main && npm run llms:docs:main && astro dev
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run shred-docs && npm run copy-docs && npm run llms && npm run llms-full && npm run llms-full:main && npm run llms:docs:main && astro check && astro build
scripts.build:docs: npm run copy-assets && npm run shred-docs && npm run llms:docs && astro check && astro build --config astro.config.docs.mjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:docs
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy deploy --project-name=gastownhall-website
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run build:docs && wrangler pages deploy deploy-docs --project-name=gastown-docs
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test && npm run audit:check
